original_text: (At that time I stood between the Lord and you to declare to you the word of the Lord, because you were afraid of the fire and did not go up the mountain.) And he said:
korean_text: 그 때에 너희가 불을 두려워하여 산에 오르지 못하므로 내가 여호와와 너희 중간에 서서 여호와의 말씀을 너희에게 전하였노라 여호와께서 이르시되

sentences.original_text: I stood between the Lord and you
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 주와 당신 사이에 서 있었고

sentences.original_text: to declare to you the word of the Lord
because you were afraid of the fire
and did not go up the mountain
